page.title: 2008â09 North Dakota State Bison men's basketball team

revisions.rev:
{{NCAATeamSeason |Mode=Basketball |Year=2008-09 |Prev year=2007-08 |Next year=2009-10 |Team=North Dakota State Bison |Image= |ImageSize=97 |Conference=The Summit League |Division= |ShortConference=Summit League |CoachRank= |APRank= |Record=26-7 |ConfRecord=16-2 |HeadCoach=[[Saul Phillips (basketball)|Saul Phillips]] |AsstCoach1=David Richman |AsstCoach2=Jason Kemp |AsstCoach3=Will Ryan |StadiumArena=[[Bison Sports Arena]] |Champion= Summit League Regular Season and Tournament Champions |BowlTourney=[[2009 NCAA Men's Division I Basketball Tournament|NCAA Tournament]] First Round vs [[2008â09 Kansas Jayhawks men's basketball team|Kansas]] |BowlTourneyResult=L 74-84 }} The '''2008â09 North Dakota State Bison men's basketball team''' represents [[North Dakota State University]]. The Head Coach is [[Saul Phillips (basketball)|Saul Phillips]]. The team plays its home games in the [[Bison Sports Arena]] in [[Fargo, North Dakota]], and is a member of the [[Summit League]]. They received an automic berth to the [[2009 NCAA Men's Division I Basketball Tournament|NCAA Tournament]] after winning the [[The Summit League Men's Basketball Tournament]] in their first year of eligibility, the first team to do so since [[Long Beach State]] in 1970.
